postReview.title: Crystal Palace 0-2 West Ham: Soucek and Bowen earn Lopetegui first win
postReview.description: Julen Lopetegui has his first win in charge of West Ham, with Tomas Soucek and Jarrod Bowen sealing the victory against Crystal Palace.

preReview.title: Lopetegui challenges West Ham to show 'competitive' edge against Palace
preReview.description: Crystal Palace and West Ham are both looking to put their Premier League opening-day defeats behind them when they meet at Selhurst Park.
